panels.title: Number of clients currently connected to the database server
Number of unused connections available for new clients
Amount of memory used by the database process
Amount of space taken by cached data (bytes)

panels.description: wiredTiger.cache.tracked  dirty bytes in the cache
panels.title: Amount of space taken by dirty data in the cache (bytes)

panels.description: wiredTiger.cache.unmodified pages evicted + wiredTiger.cache.modified pages evicted
panels.title: Number of pages evicted from the cache
Number of clients with read operations in progress or queued
Number of clients with write operations in progress or queued
Number of cursors currently opened by MongoDB for clients
Number of cursors that have timed out during the selected time period
The number of open cursors with timeout disabled
Number of times MongoDB had to request from disk (per sec)
Number of objects (documents) among all the collections
Number of read tickets in use
Number of write tickets in use
Number of available read tickets remaining
Number of available write tickets remaining
Number of read requests currently queued
Number of write requests currently queued
Number of assertions corresponding to errors generated by users

panels.description: asserts: rollovers (The MongoDB log files will give you more details as assertions counters will rollover to zero if the MongoDB’s process is restarted or after 2^30 assertions)
panels.title: Assertion rollover
